job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As part of this transformation we are creating a new centralized team focused on supporting Customer Care. This team consists of Data Scientists, Data Engineers, and Cloud Specialists, all skilled in their expertise with and in AWS (Amazon Web Services) and Azure OpenAI services. For this new Data Customer Care team, we are recruiting a Data Engineer.
   Ideal Candidate:
     * Experience: Programmer with python skills. Knowledge of AWS is a pre.
     * Skills: Proficiency in Python, and an understanding of CI/CD setup, creating architecture solutions, creating API's, and AWS.
     * Personality: Empathic, decisive, humorous, people-focused, authentic, and honest. Eagerness for growth and embracing challenges.
     * Contribution: We value 'Culture Add' over 'Culture Fit'. We are not recruiting clones. We're interested in what unique qualities you bring to our team, data universe and culture.

   Role and Responsibilities:
     * Key Tasks: Understanding, collecting, and structuring data, implementing technical solutions, and managing data architecture. Setting up the CI/CD pipeline in a secure way considering privacy constraints. Applying solid software engineering way of working in the projects. Setup monitoring for generative AI models.
     * Impact: Playing a crucial role in utilizing generative AI for customer care and making the new solutions bring increased capabilities to agent and customer.

   What's Next and Fun in the Role:
     * Objective (short term): Creating an internal chatbot for agents to better answer customer questions. Improving solutions to summarize and label why customers contact us.
     * Objective (middle term): Making updates to our website (FAQ) and chatbot to use more interactive capabilities of GenAI.
     * Challenge: The excitement lies in tackling setting up solid monitoring of generative AI solutions and scaling to responds to many agents and customers., At Odido we learn every day. All of us. You are responsible for your own development. That is why you decide how, what and when you learn. We have more than 200 digital training courses with which you can work on professional and personal goals. We don't do old-fashioned performance reviews and assessments. You keep your manager and colleagues informed of your goals and progress. You are in control.
job_details.full_text:
Data Engineer A.I. "AWS"

As part of this transformation we are creating a new centralized team focused on supporting Customer Care. This team consists of Data Scientists, Data Engineers, and Cloud Specialists, all skilled in their expertise with and in AWS (Amazon Web Services) and Azure OpenAI services. For this new Data Customer Care team, we are recruiting a Data Engineer.
   Ideal Candidate:
     * Experience: Programmer with python skills. Knowledge of AWS is a pre.
     * Skills: Proficiency in Python, and an understanding of CI/CD setup, creating architecture solutions, creating API's, and AWS.
     * Personality: Empathic, decisive, humorous, people-focused, authentic, and honest. Eagerness for growth and embracing challenges.
     * Contribution: We value 'Culture Add' over 'Culture Fit'. We are not recruiting clones. We're interested in what unique qualities you bring to our team, data universe and culture.

   Role and Responsibilities:
     * Key Tasks: Understanding, collecting, and structuring data, implementing technical solutions, and managing data architecture. Setting up the CI/CD pipeline in a secure way considering privacy constraints. Applying solid software engineering way of working in the projects. Setup monitoring for generative AI models.
     * Impact: Playing a crucial role in utilizing generative AI for customer care and making the new solutions bring increased capabilities to agent and customer.

   What's Next and Fun in the Role:
     * Objective (short term): Creating an internal chatbot for agents to better answer customer questions. Improving solutions to summarize and label why customers contact us.
     * Objective (middle term): Making updates to our website (FAQ) and chatbot to use more interactive capabilities of GenAI.
     * Challenge: The excitement lies in tackling setting up solid monitoring of generative AI solutions and scaling to responds to many agents and customers., At Odido we learn every day. All of us. You are responsible for your own development. That is why you decide how, what and when you learn. We have more than 200 digital training courses with which you can work on professional and personal goals. We don't do old-fashioned performance reviews and assessments. You keep your manager and colleagues informed of your goals and progress. You are in control.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on data engineering tasks and the use of AI tools for customer care, including building chatbots and summarizing data. While it mentions 'generative AI models' and 'GenAI', it lacks depth in core generative AI engineering responsibilities such as fine-tuning LLMs, advanced prompt engineering, or building complex RAG systems. The primary emphasis is on data handling, infrastructure, and applying existing AI capabilities, rather than developing or deeply customizing generative AI models themselves. The role also mentions 'Data Scientists' and 'Cloud Specialists' as part of the team, suggesting a more specialized focus for this 'Data Engineer' role. The core responsibilities and technologies lean more towards data engineering and MLOps for AI applications rather than core GenAI development, making it ambiguous for a specialized GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions 'Data Engineers' as part of the team and lists 'collecting, and structuring data' and 'managing data architecture' as key tasks.
The role involves managing the overall data architecture, which is a core component of data engineering.
The description mentions 'creating API's' and applying a 'solid software engineering way of working', which are fundamental software development tasks.
Applying a 'solid software engineering way of working' indicates a focus on building and maintaining software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Applying solid software engineering way of working

job_tasks.justification: The role involves setting up CI/CD pipelines, which is a key aspect of MLOps and operations engineering.
Setting up monitoring for generative AI models is a direct application of MLOps principles to AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Setup monitoring for generative AI models

job_tasks.justification: Scaling solutions to respond to many agents and customers implies a need for robust production systems and monitoring, which falls under operations engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: scaling to responds to many agents and customers

job_tasks.justification: The role is focused on supporting 'Customer Care' and utilizing AI for customer care, indicating an understanding of business needs.
The objective of creating an internal chatbot and improving solutions to summarize and label customer contacts involves the application and potential adaptation of AI models.
Improving solutions to summarize and label customer contacts implies working with models for text processing and classification.
job_tasks.phrase: Improving solutions to summarize and label why customers contact us

job_tasks.justification: Making updates to use more interactive capabilities of GenAI for website FAQs and chatbots involves leveraging and potentially adapting generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: Making updates to our website (FAQ) and chatbot to use more interactive capabilities of GenAI

soft_skills.phrase: At Odido we learn every day. All of us.
You are responsible for your own development.
setting up solid monitoring of generative AI solutions
interested in what unique qualities you bring
